About.name: About
About.description: Returns information about the dxc4 API. Does not require any parameters.

Game.name: Game
Game.description: Creates a game based on a set of moves in algebraic notation. All parameters are optional.

pgn.description: A PGN compatible moves string starting from the initial board position. Numbering the moves is optional. Any underscores are treated as spaces.

includes.description: What kind of information about the game should be returned. You can also request multiple or even all items by passing in a comma seperated string. (Defaults to: status,pgn)

moveCount.description: Optinally sets the game's state to an earlier move and discards any subsequent moves. Negative numbers will be offset from the last half move.

nextMove.description: You can pass in a single move in algebraic notation to be applied to the game.

stockfish.description: Experimental: If set to true the best next move will be determined by the stockfish chess engine and applied to the game.
